description: His6-oTG2 is based on the NCBI database sequence XM_008256006. It is N-terminally fused to a hexahistidine-tag resulting in the encoded N-terminal amino acid sequence MHHHHHHAEDLIL…. His6-oTG2 is produced in E. coli and purified by ion metal chelating chromatography to more than 95 % purity.
name: Rabbit tissue transglutaminase
